alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 6:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WESTERN WAKULLA...SOUTHWESTERN GADSDEN...LIBERTY...SOUTHWESTERN LEON AND NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM EDT... At 641 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Midway to 9 miles west of Crawfordville to 13 miles southwest of St. Marks. Movement was west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Midway, Orange, Franklin, Bristol, Sopchoppy, East Camp, Rock Bluff, Jewel Fire Tower, Juniper, Vilas, Hosford, Jensen Place, Central City, Panacea, Red Hill, Clio, Poplar Camp, Smith Creek, and Medart. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Leon
